who.title: Who am I?
who.description: Hello, welcome to my website, my name is Luciano Coronel and I am a Full Stack Web Developer. I work with programming languages widely used in the Technology Industry. I enjoy creatins scalable websites and applications. I love learning and putting into practice the new knowledge that I am learning over time.
